title: Sign In
subtitle: Welcome back! Please sign in to your account.

mfa.title: Two-Factor Authentication
mfa.subtitle: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your device.

forgotPasswordPage.title: Reset Password
forgotPasswordPage.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPasswordPage.linkSent: Password reset link has been sent to your email.

resetPasswordPage.title: Create New Password
resetPasswordPage.subtitle: Enter your new password below.
resetPasswordPage.passwordReset: Your password has been reset successfully.

errors.accountLocked: Account is locked. Please try again later.
errors.mfaSessionExpired: Verification session has expired. Please sign in again.
errors.weakPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.maxLength: Must be no more than {{max}} characters.

success.logoutSuccess: You have been logged out successfully.
success.passwordResetSent: Password reset instructions have been sent to your email.
success.passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully.

welcome.title: Welcome to PieDocs
welcome.subtitle: Let's get you set up with personalized preferences
welcome.message: Welcome to your new Document Management System
welcome.description: PieDocs helps you organize, search, and manage all your documents efficiently with powerful AI-driven features and seamless collaboration tools.

notifications.title: Notification Preferences
notifications.subtitle: Choose how you want to be notified
notifications.emailDesc: Receive updates and alerts via email
notifications.smsDesc: Get important alerts via text message

folders.title: Initial Folder Structure
folders.subtitle: Set up your document organization
folders.createDefaultDesc: Automatically create a basic folder structure to get you started

tutorial.title: Quick Tutorial
tutorial.subtitle: Learn the basics of PieDocs
tutorial.showTutorialDesc: Take a guided tour of PieDocs features and capabilities
